attributes.action: Iraq Enquiry be held in public
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Hold an enquiry into the actions and statements leading to the Iraq war. The enquiry is to be held in public and to have the legal powers to call witnesses, including past and present members of parliament and security services. and the power to recommend prosicution of any found guilty of wrong doing.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
